name: Confidential Business Resources
overview: Confidential Business Resources, Inc. operates as a professional investigation company in the United States. It specializes in assisting businesses with intelligence gathering, surveillance, and investigations. The company provides surveillance, background activities investigation, claims investigation, and corporate investigation services, as well as on-scene accident investigations services. Its clients include insurance carriers, third party administrators, self-insured companies, insurance defense law firms, and multi-national organizations. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Nashville, Tennessee. As of August 15, 2005, Confidential Business Resources is a subsidiary of GlobalOptions Group, Inc.
